basicInfo.name: Bai Jiao
basicInfo.flavor: Eventually, Bai Jiao became the emperor's right-hand man and was known as the \"Eminent Official.\" There are many rumors circulating among the people that he bewitched the emperor with his sorcery.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 40% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Adds Effect: 40% chance to inflict Bleed. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.name: Centipede Poison
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 60% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Unable to Recover. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 110% of Magic Attack.
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict Unable to Recover. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Chance: Poison chance becomes 70%.

Skill 2.name: Fiendish Decree
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 60% chance to inflict Bleed. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 110% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Chance: Bleed chance becomes 70%.

Passive.name: Dark Incantations
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 32% of the caster's Magic Attack upon performing any attack 2 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Turns: All Damage Immunity duration becomes 3 turn(s).
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 22% Effect Probability Boost.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Centipedes, Pascal, all chicken dishes, fairness, clever people, studying demonic power and the Power of Destruction
profile.dislikes: Live chickens, birds, Teo, Orly, Seven Knights, indifferent people, incompetent people
profile.story: Eventually, Bai Jiao became the emperor's right-hand man and was known as the \"Eminent Official.\" There are many rumors circulating among the people that he bewitched the emperor with his sorcery.

basicInfo.name: Bai Jiao
basicInfo.flavor: Armed with his vast knowledge and wisdom, Bai Jiao began to personally assist the emperor, earning him the moniker of \"Influential Official\" in recognition of his contributions. He seems to believe he owes his success to his mastery of sorcery and spells.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Centipede Poison
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 82% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 60% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 82% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Fiendish Decree
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 72% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 60% chance to inflict Bleed. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.name: Dark Incantations
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 28% of the caster's Magic Attack upon performing any attack 2 time(s).

profile.story: Armed with his vast knowledge and wisdom, Bai Jiao began to personally assist the emperor, earning him the moniker of \"Influential Official\" in recognition of his contributions. He seems to believe he owes his success to his mastery of sorcery and spells.

basicInfo.name: Bai Jiao
basicInfo.flavor: Bai Jiao is a young man of exceptional intellect who rapidly aced the civil service exam and went on to serve as a civil official. His unusual interest in spells and sorcery make him an object of scrutiny for those around him.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Centipede Poison
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 73% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 50% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 73% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Fiendish Decree
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 65% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 50% chance to inflict Bleed. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.name: Dark Incantations
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 26% of the caster's Magic Attack upon performing any attack 2 time(s).

profile.dislikes: Live chickens, birds, Teo, Orly, Seven Knights, indifferent people, incompetent people
